thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 8 of 311
thread.title: DeanDurham

author: DeanDurham
title: DeanDurham
text: Recently I had a co-worker pass away. Looking for flowers to gift to the family for the funeral was the last thing I ever wanted to do. She had such a bright and warm smile I wanted to gift an arrangement that stood out like her smile. The website was great and easy to use. The flower arrangement looked wonderful. I appreciate the hard work the employees put in to make this arrangement stand out. Though her smile is much prettier than any flower arrangement could ever be, it certainly reminded us that she was a beautiful person with an amazing smile. I couldn't have picked a better arrangement to represent her for the beautiful person she was. Thank you so much!
